scripts.migration:generate: set TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.typeorm.json&& ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate -d configurations/ormConfig.ts --outputJs
scripts.migration:run: set TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.typeorm.json&& cross-env TYPEORM_CLI=1&& ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d configurations/ormConfig.ts
scripts.migration:revert: set TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.typeorm.json&& ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d configurations/ormConfig.ts
